A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you were expecting answers\, consistently\, or closure for departing characters it's not in this movie.  Special effects and comedy don't cover up the glaring plots holes and characters inconsistencies.  This train wreck of a movie makes it hard to see or care for movie 9.  If you like Star Wars avoid this one.  If you just like science fantasy it might be be an okay film for the flashy special effects
